name: WarpBall
description: Football with a futuristic twist, WarpBall lets players teleport around the pitch for unrivaled mobility.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP Processor: Intel Core2 Duo / Athron64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c support (256 MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c support
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD multicore processor recently 4 years Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD in recently 4 years DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c support
